dc_title_s: Sketch of the public surveys in Michigan; Surveyor General's Office, Detroit, October 23rd, 1856, Leander Chapman, Surveyor General.
dc_description_s: At head of title: G. Removed from: U.S. 34th Congress, 3d Session, 1856/57. H. Ex. Doc. l. Inset: [Isle Royale]. 1 map; 53 x 52 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
